name: organic cotton cushion covers - i am indigo crosses
description:
Crosses in indigo cushion cover - Its Holli Zollinger for The Organic Mamas! Our next great collaboration. Our most popular pattern in gorgeous wintery indigo. 
100% organic cotton sateen cushion cover lovingly handmade in my studio in Sydney using fabric grown, woven, and printed in the United States using non-toxic pigments. Certified organic under GOTS (Global Organic Textile Standards).

A perfect match for an insert measuring 45cm x 45cm (18in x 18in) - generous and plump for eco-cuddling.

Its the greenest (and most beautiful) cushion of all !! 
Envelope opening on the back for super easy washing.

The organic cotton sateen makes for a great colourful cushion but still soft enough to make you say aagghhh........

Envelope opening on the back for super easy washing.

The organic cotton sateen makes for a great colourful cushion but still soft enough to make you say aagghhh........

Made in Australia

Price is for cover only.

name: Footstool - Restored - The Giselle - Conventional cotton
description:
Beautiful retro restored footstool. 
Reupholstered in gorgeous Aqua Diamond Circles by Holli Zollinger for The Organic Mamas. 
Clean, elegant lines. 
Great as a footstool, stool or even a bedside table. 
Measures 30cm x 40cm x 33cm high. 
Cushion height: 6cm 
Please note: Unlike all my other products, this is recovered in conventional cotton (not organic).

description:
Enchanted Forest cushion cover - soft as a baby's skin, perfect for your little eco-baby. 100% organic cotton twill cushion lovingly handmade in my studio in Sydney using fabric grown, woven, and printed in the United States using non-toxic pigments.

A perfect match for our biodegradable corn insert 45cm x 45cm - generous and plump for eco-cuddling.

Its the greenest (and most beautiful) cushion of all !!

Envelope opening on the back for super easy washing.

The organic cotton canvas makes for a great hardwearing cushion but still soft enough to make you say aagghhh........

Add our corn insert for the greenest cushion of them all!!

name: Green Apple Tote - Small
description:
Another beautiful collaboration from The Organic Mamas and Birchseed!

100% organic cotton shopping bag, extra strong and durable - 10 oz canvas, lovingly hand block printed with 100% solvent free, water-based, non-toxic inks (Permaset Aqua) by Nikki from birchseed in her lovely studio in Murwillumbah, Northern NSW. Nikki's method allows her the time and space to SLOW down and enjoy an artful process whist being a stay at home mum. The uniqueness of each print matches perfecty with the texture of the organic canvas fabric.

Reusable, sustainable, organic, eco-friendly - Its the greenest (and most unique) shopping bag of them all !!

Great size for a quick shop, a couple of bottles of wine or even as a kid's library bag. 
Measures approx 31cm high and 29cm wide at the top and 25cm wide at the bottom.

These really are the Rolls Royce of organic cotton bags!

The Organic Mamas products are made from 100% organic cotton and are free from dyes or chemicals.

Made in India - SKAL Certified. Printed by hand in Australia.

name: Chain Link
description:
Shades of Grey collection from Daisy Janie
100% GOTS certified organic cotton.
A mid-weight fabric perfect for hobby and home.
Fabric width: 112-114cm
Fabric weight: 153gsm (or 4.5oz/sq yd for the old schoolers).

Order by the 0.1 metre (ie 10cm). For example, if you require 1.5m you need to order 15 units. Any questions just email the mamas through the contact page.

For Australian residents: GST included.

name: Anticipate - oyster/mustard - $60/m
description:
oh, 2 of my favourite foods - oysters and mustard - now on the same fabric by Mod Green Pod! Dramatic rococo-inspired medallions printed on luxurious 8-ounce organic cotton canvas. Grown, woven, and printed in the United States using non-toxic pigments. As with all of our range of Mod Green Pod canvas textile, Anticipate is suitable for a wide range of home decoration projects.

Printed Width: Approximately 137cm

Repeat: 45.7cm X 23.9cm (V x H). Each medallion is approximately 41.9cm tall by 23.4cm wide.

Order by the 0.1 metre (ie 10cm). For example, if you require 1.5m you need to order 15 units. Any questions just email the mamas through the contact page.

For Australian residents: GST included.

name: Ogee Cushion Cover
description:
Ogee cushion cover - funky mod design on soft mid-weight fabric, perfect for your eco-home. 100% organic cotton cushion lovingly handmade in my studio in Sydney using 100% GOTS-certified organic cotton.

A perfect match for our biodegradable corn insert 45cm x 45cm - generous and plump for eco-cuddling.

Its the greenest (and most beautiful) cushion of all !!

Envelope opening on the back for super easy washing.

The organic cotton canvas makes for a great hardwearing cushion but still soft enough to make you say aagghhh........

Add our corn insert for the greenest cushion of them all!!

Made in Australia

Price is for cover only - add an insert for $15.95.
